press_button.description: Press the microwave button to set the timer.

close_door.description: When the door is closed, no action required.

turn_knob.description: Rotate the microwave knob to adjust the settings.

clean_rotation_tray.description: Clean the rotating tray to ensure cleanliness.

clean_microwave_body.description: Clean the outer body of the microwave to keep it clean and shiny.

clean_whole_microwave.description: Clean the entire microwave including the body, door, button, knob and tray.
